text: Eivind Skabo (August 17, 1916 - April 18, 2006) was a Norwegian sprint canoeist who competed in the late 1940s. He won a bronze medal in the K-1 10000 m event at the 1948 Summer Olympics in London. Skabio also won a silver medal in K-1 4 x 500 m at the 1948 ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships, also in London. ==References== * * *Sports-reference.com profile Category:1916 births Category:2006 deaths Category:Canoeists at the 1948 Summer Olympics Category:Norwegian male canoeists Category:Olympic canoeists of Norway Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Norway Category:Olympic medalists in canoeing Category:ICF Canoe Sprint World Championships medalists in kayak Category:Medalists at the 1948 Summer Olympics
title: Eivind Skabo
